title: pANDuranga prabhuvE
sahitya:
pANDuranga prabhuvE undan pAdamE gati enreppOdum nambinOm jaya


anupallavi

  paNDari nAthA haro Om enrE padamalar bhajitta bharukkaruL shrI


caraNam    puNDarIkAkSA parama puruSA pUrva caritra rukmiNI nAthA
nINDa bhavak-kaDalait-tANDiya un aruL pera vENDum varam tandu ANDaruL ayyanE
